name: lingodisco-inline-translate
author: James Cooley
description: Add an inline translation to a selected piece of text. It works with Google and Bing translate but can work with any web translation service by changing the user preferences.

preferences.description: The name of the translation input box for the web translation service
preferences.name: translation_input
preferences.title: Input?

preferences.description: The name of the translation output box for the web translation service
preferences.name: translation_output
preferences.title: Output?

preferences.description: This extension is designed for short translations. This setting is used to try to limit bad clipboard selections e.g. when the entire page is selected by mistake.
preferences.name: translation_cutoff
preferences.title: Selection check limit?

preferences.description: The number of items from the translation history to display in the panel
preferences.name: translation_history_count
preferences.title: Translation history count?
